name: Monster Fighter
description:
Welcome to Monster Fighter, a 2D fighting game for everyone.





Face adorable Kaijus in fun battles to prove you are the strongest.
A game where you will test your skill by repeatedly pressing a single button.
Can you be the one finger fighting king?

ATTENTION. This game is only for 2 players exclusively.


Believe it or not, monsters exist and live in their own world.
One day one of them, the adorable Teddy Butcher Bear, decides to organize a fighting tournament by summoning them all to show their skills and find out who is the strongest...





- Versus mode fighting game (1 vs 1).
- 12 wonderful monsters
- 12 fabulous scenarios
- 2 players (Cooperative mode only)

How to play

.
- Player 1 presses the A button.
- Player 2 presses the L button.
- Selection of characters and scenarios with the mouse.
